page.title: 11SURVEY OF LIFESTYLES 2
page.content: We surveyed a cross section of people about their lifestyle. We investigated their clothes, their hobbies, their pets even what their houses were built of and how many people had labout saving machines in either house or garden. The size of the survey was 36 people. The people of Winterton have a fairly good standard of living equal to most small towns in England. The town is well laid out. It is a small town north of Scunthorpe. It is a mixture of old and new houses. There are few busy streetsMost houses are made of wood and stone or brick and stone. 14% are pebbledash and 19% are plastered. Most people have gardens to their houses. Machines make peoples' lives a lot easier. There are 3 schools plus a playgroup. Most people have hobbies taking up varying amounts of time.
